### Why This Invokes a Rockstar?
- **Name & Description**: uniquivocale and descriptive – sets the tone for elite performance while hooking into Copilot's discovery.
- **Tools & MCP**: Enables god-mode access (read/edit/search/shell + GitHub integration via secrets). This lets it interact deeply with your repo, like a true collaborator.
- **Instructions**: Detailed, structured prompt engineering ensures consistent, high-value outputs. It's modular for chaining (e.g., delegating to other agents).
- **Flair**: Adds personality without fluff – makes interactions complete and future proofed
